SETS.query: Set of 3 products (I, II, III), 2 processing stages (A, B), 2 equipment types for stage A (A1, A2), and 2 equipment types for stage B (B1, B2)

VARIABLES.name: x_I
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for producing Product I

VARIABLES.name: x_II
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for producing Product II

VARIABLES.name: x_III
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for producing Product III

VARIABLES.name: y_A1_I
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using A1 equipment for Product I

VARIABLES.name: y_A2_I
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using A2 equipment for Product I

VARIABLES.name: y_B1_I
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using B1 equipment for Product I

VARIABLES.name: y_B2_I
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using B2 equipment for Product I

VARIABLES.name: y_A1_III
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using A1 equipment for Product III

VARIABLES.name: y_A2_III
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using A2 equipment for Product III

VARIABLES.name: y_B2_III
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for using B2 equipment for Product III

PARAMETERS.name: raw_material_cost_I
PARAMETERS.description: Raw material cost for Product I (Yuan/Piece)

PARAMETERS.name: raw_material_cost_II
PARAMETERS.description: Raw material cost for Product II (Yuan/Piece)

PARAMETERS.name: raw_material_cost_III
PARAMETERS.description: Raw material cost for Product III (Yuan/Piece)
